About Me

My name is Maxim and I like to code in many programming languages. I mostly program in python, but I also sometimes create javascript applications with pure js, node js and jQuery. I am also familiar with markup languages like xml, html, markdown, as well as data storing formats such as JSON. I have a good knowledge of bootstrap and am learning how to use jekyll.
